title: Mao's China
creator_credit: Jessie Nishihata, Joe Schlesinger and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Chairman Mao’s thoughts provide the basis for a generalized explanation of Chinese society. Using Peking, Shanghai and Tientsin as examples, shows street scenes, a housing estate and a commune. Stresses the value of manual labour and the control of society by the people. Suitable for upper secondary level.
